汗.definition: perspiration; sweat; CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]; to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)

汗如雨下.definition: sweating like rain (idiom); to perspire profusely; sweating like a pig

汗斑.definition: common name for 花斑癬|花斑癣[hua1 ban1 xuan3], tinea versicolor

汗流浹背.definition: to sweat profusely (idiom); drenched in sweat

汗漫.definition: vast; without boundaries; power (of a river or ocean)

汗牛充棟.definition: lit. enough books to make a pack-ox sweat or to fill a house to the rafters (idiom); fig. many books

汗血馬.definition: (in ancient times) Ferghana horse; (later) fine horse

汗馬.definition: (lit.) to exert one's horse; (fig.) war exploits; warhorse (abbr. for 汗血馬|汗血马[han4 xue4 ma3])

汗騰格里峰.definition: Khan Tengri or Mt Hantengri on the border between Xinjiang and Kazakhstan
